title: Dr. Kananga

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: You may use the ability of any deceased player

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You can limited use abilities indefinitely with a one day cooldown.

fields.name: Scheme:
fields.value:
**Big problem:**
All SPECTRE members now permanently have access to dead chat, and gain 1 vote for every X dead players. With X being the number of SPECTRE players alive at the time this scheme is completed.

desc:
Post 4179
*Any cost, any.... Bond must die.*
